title: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw for Sports and Travel, BPA-Free, 32oz, Dreamy Field
descriptions:
Introducing the Owala FreeSip 32oz Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle â€“ your perfect companion for sports and travel!

This stylish and durable water bottle, featuring the captivating "Dreamy Field" design, is crafted from premium stainless steel for ultimate durability and a sleek, modern look. The double-wall insulation keeps your drinks cold for an astounding 24 hours, making it perfect for those long, active days.

The unique FreeSip spout offers both a built-in straw and a swig opening, providing versatility and convenience for your hydration needs. The push-button lid, with its protective lock and push-to-open feature, ensures easy, spill-free sipping while keeping your bottle safe and secure.

Cleaning is a breeze with the dishwasher-safe lid, and the hand-washable bottle maintains its luster for years to come. Rest assured, this product is BPA-free and phthalate-free, ensuring your health and safety.

Please note that the Owala FreeSip Water Bottle is not suitable for hot liquids. However, its wide opening makes it easy to add ice and ensure your drink stays chilled. The carry loop not only provides a convenient way to transport your bottle but also functions as a lock, ensuring your lid stays secure.

Available in various sizes (24-Ounce, 32-Ounce, 40-Ounce) and backed by a limited lifetime warranty, the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle is the ultimate choice for active individuals seeking style, durability, and functionality. Stay hydrated in style with Owala FreeSip!
